```{r}
B2k = c(1/6,-1/30,1/42,-1/30,5/66,-691/2730,7/6,-3617/510, 43867/798, -174611/330)
k = c(1:10)

digamma10 = function(m) {
  n = m-1
  log(n)+1/(2*n)-sapply(n,function(n) sum(B2k/(2*k*n^(2*k))))
}

digamma2 = function(m) {
  n = m-1
  log(n)+1/(2*n)-1/(12*n^2)
}

n = c(2:300)

digamma10(n)-base::digamma(n)
digamma2(n)-base::digamma(n)


digamma10(300)-base::digamma(300)
digamma2(300)-base::digamma(300)

(digamma10(300)-base::digamma(300))/base::digamma(300)
(digamma2(300)-base::digamma(300))/base::digamma(300)


```

by N=300 error term in both cases is abs 0.003333333 (rel: 0.0005845784)
